short_summary: Health products and food branch (HPFB) require business analysts and testers for IT projects
description: This contract is in French and English but summaries below provide information.",
full_summary:
# Notice of Request for Proposal - TBIPS: Tester/Business System Analyst

## Project Overview

The Health Products and Food Branch (HPFB) requires the services of two level 2 Testers and three level 2 Business Systems Analysts to support IT projects across the department On an as-needed basis served by Task Authorization in line with the outline of services to be provided. This request is limited to TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region.

## Requirement Details

* Two (2) level 2 Testers
* Three (3) level 2 Business Systems Analysts

## Purpose

HPFB aims to modernize business efficiency and coordinate Information Technology (IT) systems with departmental strategies. By contracting and managing qualified resources, HPFB will assist in ensuring that Canadians are informed and departmental goals and needs can be met.

## Scope of Work

The successful bidder(s) will provide Tester and Business System Analyst services to support various HPFB initiatives. Task Authorizations (TA) will be used to issue specific services as needed.

## Eligible Bidder(s)

Sixteen (16) vendors have been prequalified and are invited to submit proposals:

1. A Hundred Answers Inc.
2. Bits In Glass Inc.
3. BRYCA Solutions Inc.
4. Cistel Technology Inc.
5. Computacenter Teramach Inc.
6. Dalian Enterprises and Coradix Technology Consulting (joint venture)
7. Donna Cona Inc.
8. iFathom Corporation
9. Maplesoft Consulting Inc.
10. OpenFrame Technologies and Mindstream TC & PSB (Joint Venture)
11. Promaxis Systems Inc.
12. Randstad Interim Inc.
13. Sierra Systems Group Inc.
14. Sundiata Warren Group Inc.
15. Veritaaq Technology House Inc.

## Tender Documents

The Request for Proposal (RFP) and all related documents are available on the following websites:

* English: [PWC Request](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/25/051001044bd005f4050f4a3d2cc98079/1000246906_-_npp_en.pdf)
* French: [PWC Request](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/25/4d9d3fbbf7e5f66116cde154b229f
